title: The Islanders
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Torres Strait Islands (Qld.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Torres Strait Islanders
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indigenous peoples - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Ethnology - Australia
description: Aspects of life in the Torres Strait Islands, showing the rich culture of the people with their songs and dances, set against bright tropical backgrounds, in striking contrast to many parts of Australia. Shows how strongly the old traditions still affect the people, even though they have modern schools, shops, out-board motors and transistors.
